description: An ip allocation request may result in more than one ip being allocated for a vif (for example one v4 and one v6). The allocate call should return a list of ips allocated and the port security set for each one.
title: quantum port security only works the the 1st address

comments.content: An ip allocation request may result in more than one ip being allocated for a vif (for example one v4 and one v6). The allocate call should return a list of ips allocated and the port security set for each one.
